1@ In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires Jpterpreta~
eligible film artiste or teckmician* means a film artist:
or technician who has been engaged on a contrac-
tual basis, (other then a lyric writer, lighting
technician or play-backsinger to whom such
requirement shail not. be: applicable) in the
production of a minimum of three films as a result
of which he has earned eredit titles during a period
of not less than ten years;
film artiste or technician includes any actor, film
director, script writer, lyric writer, muisic director,
play-back singer, make-up artiste, art director,
cameraman, editor or lighting technician, who was
or is engaged directly in the production of films
fn Srl Lanka ;
Film Corporation means the National Film Corpora-
tion of Sri Lanka established under the National
Film Corporation Act, No. 47 of 1971.
